summary: Provides core utilities for constructing and operating diffusion pipelines using Flax, including a base pipeline class that orchestrates models, schedulers, and processors with configuration handling, component registration, loading, saving, and optional progress display, as well as a structured output container for generated images.
business_intent: Facilitate the development, deployment, and sharing of Flax-based diffusion models for image generation, allowing seamless integration with the Hugging Face ecosystem and simplifying model lifecycle management.
